con:request.name: SO Create
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_3" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_3" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v5" xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_3" xmlns:urn4="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_3"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>
<wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_PM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> <urn:standingOrder> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:recurrence>WEEKLY</urn1:recurrence> <urn1:dueDates> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:dueDate>${Properties#DueDate}</urn1:dueDate> </urn1:dueDates> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:exemptions> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:exemption> <urn1:startDate>${Properties#ExceptionStartDate}</urn1:startDate> <urn1:endDate>${Properties#ExceptionEndDate}</urn1:endDate> <urn1:recurring>false</urn1:recurring> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:description>DescriptionOneExemption</urn1:description> </urn1:exemption> </urn1:exemptions> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:paymentInfo> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:instructionPriority>HIGH</urn3:instructionPriority> </urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}"> <urn2:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bic>${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>cred</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>4502</urn2:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:countrySubDivision>test</urn2:countrySubDivision> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>cred</urn2:name><urn2:postalAddress><urn2:postCode>3243</urn2:postCode><urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName><urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country></urn2:postalAddress></urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn2:currency> </urn4:creditorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:transaction> <urn1:standingOrderType>PERIODIC</urn1:standingOrderType> <!--Optional:--> </urn:standingOrder> </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from STO_AGREEMENT where AGREEMENTID = '${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_3'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_3'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}'

con:request.name: SO Confirm

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>
<wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_PM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> <urn:standingOrderKey> <urn1:agreementId>${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_3'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_3'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId><urn1:agreementVersion>${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_3'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_3'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementVersion[1]}</urn1:agreementVersion> </urn:standingOrderKey> <urn:standingOrderAction>CONFIRM</urn:standingOrderAction> </urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from STO_AGREEMENT where AGREEMENTID = '${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_3'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_3'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}'
select * from STO_RECURRENCE where FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID ='${SO Create VALI#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/INTERNAL_ID[1]}'
select * from STO_RECURRENCE_COMPLETED where FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID ='${SO Create VALI#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/INTERNAL_ID[1]}'

select * from TRANSACTIONS where AGREEMENTID = '${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_3'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_3'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}'
